casebody.data:
J. G. BRILL CO. et al., Appellants, v. Edwin B. MEISSNER et al., etc.* No. 6674. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Oct. 7, 1938. Plugh M. Morris, of Wilmington, Del., and Noah A. Stancliffe, of New York City, for appellants. John J. Darby and C. Willard Hayes, both of Washington, D. C., Samuel D. Good-is, of Philadelphia, Pa., and Gorham F. Freer, of Washington, D. C. (Sundheim, Folz & Sundheim, of Philadelphia, Pa., and Cushman, Darby & Cushman, of Washington, D. C., of counsel), for appellees.

Before BIGGS, Circuit Judge, and AVIS and- MARIS, District Judges.

Rehearing denied Dec. 9, 1938.

 PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on the opinion of Judge Kirkpatrick of the court below, 25 F.Supp. 244.
